job.title: Video Product Data Scientist, Apple Media Products - Culver City
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtAt Apple great ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products services and customer experiences very quickly If you are an ambitious highenergy individual who is not afraid of challenges were looking for you ltbrgtltbrgtApple is seeking an expert Data Scientist to join a team passionate about Data Science ampamp Analytics for the media space This role will primarily focus on the Video business which includes subscription Apple TV Apple TV Channels third party services and Apple Fitness and transactional business iTunes moviestv showsltbrgtltbrgtThis role will involve working with Internetscale data across numerous product and customer touch points undertaking indepth quantitative analysis building models and partnering with business stakeholders to drive product and strategyltbrgtltbrgtThe teams culture is centered around rapid iteration with open feedback and debate along the way We encourage independent decisionmaking and taking calculated risks AMP Data Science collaborates extensively with partners across product design engineering content and business teams our mission is to drive innovation at Apple through deep quantitive research of the App Store Apple Music Apple TV and Apple Arcade amongst other servicesltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgt2 years of experience in a Data Scientist or Data Analyst role preferably for a digital media or digital subscription businessltbrgtltbrgtStrong proficiency with SQLbased languages Experience with large scale analytics technologies such as Hadoop and Spark preferredltbrgtltbrgtCurious productbusiness approach with an ability to condense sophisticated concepts and analysis into clear and concise takeaways that drive actionltbrgtltbrgtFamiliarity with PythonR Git and data visualization tools such as Tableau for fullstack data analysis model building insight synthesis and presentation Knowledge of AB test experimentation design preferredltbrgtltbrgtExcellent communication social and presentation skills with meticulous attention to detailltbrgtltbrgtStrong time management skills with the ability to work with tight deadlines and pressure from executive requestsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtDive deep into largescale data to uncover trends and identify key insights that will advise business strategyltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtCraft how best to monitor measure and understand business performance and build out associated Keynote narratives datasets and dashboardsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtPartner closely with the Product organization to help them make evidencebased decisionsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtCollaborate with business marketing finance and executive teams to generate regular presentations for ClevelltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtYour creative problem solving skills will be utilized dailyltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBachelors degree in Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering Economics or related field Ideally Masters or PhD in related fieldltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200239722ltbrgtltbrgt
